job.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job.description: ltpgtOur CONFIDENTIAL growth clientampnbspis looking for experienced DevOps and Site Reliability Engineers who are interested in working with a fastgrowing team in building industryleading real estate data services You will be working on a small team using cutting edge technology and tools to build and support infrastructure for our diverse environment including customer facing applications large scale data processing and APIsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTechnologiesltpgtltulgtltligtGoogle Cloud Compute Storage NetworkingltligtltligtKubernetesltligtltligtHelmltligtltligtTerraformltligtltligtCircleCIltligtltligtMonitoring DataDog or Stackdriver StatusCakeltligtltligtLinuxltligtltligtBashltligtltligtPythonltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtApplicationData StackltpgtltulgtltligtAirflowltligtltligtHasuraltligtltligtETL processesltligtltligtDatabase Development and support Postgres BigQuery MongoDBltligtltligtGraphQLltligtltligtLookerltligtltligtNodejsltligtltligtReactReduxltligtltligtPythonltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf you can articulate the value of CICD and Infrastructureascode IAC and have handson coding experience with infrastructure management automation in the cloud GCP OR AWS would look forward to reviewing your background ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOnce you apply well send you the full job spec all company information and a highlight of their leadership teamltstronggtltpgt
